ygData.subject: Vampiric Embrace change
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you that don t know yet, the manual was updated last night, and this line is taken from it: Vampiric Embrace (Necromancer and Shadow Knight) 
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you that don't know yet, the manual was updated last night, and
this line is taken from it:


Vampiric Embrace (Necromancer and Shadow Knight)  Once cast, this spell
gives you a chance of draining HP from your target every time you attack.
Formally, this spell added to your attack roll.

So, they changed it and now we can heal, but only randomly. I guess I'll
have to wait and see what it is like when I get to level 22, but it sure
doesn't sound like anything I am going to rely on to heal me. :)

Later,
Jeremy
